        DescribeAvailabilityZonesResult zones_response =
            ec2.describeAvailabilityZones();

        for(AvailabilityZone zone : zones_response.getAvailabilityZones()) {
            System.out.printf(
                "Found availability zone %s " +
                "with status %s " +
                "in region %s",
                zone.getZoneName(),
                zone.getState(),
                zone.getRegionName());
        }
